statements: SELECT * FROM science_fair;
SELECT student_name, project_title FROM science_fair WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT project_title, advisor_name FROM science_fair WHERE presentation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, project_description FROM science_fair WHERE advisor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM science_fair ORDER BY presentation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM science_fair WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT student_name, project_title FROM science_fair WHERE advisor_name = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY presentation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM science_fair WHERE presentation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND project_title LIKE '%robot%';
SELECT student_id, student_name, project_description FROM science_fair ORDER BY student_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects, advisor_name FROM science_fair GROUP BY advisor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_projects DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_title = 'Project A';
SELECT project_title, project_date FROM projects WHERE student_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT judge_name, judge_experience FROM judges WHERE judge_department = 'Engineering';
SELECT project_id, project_title, project_date FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM judges WHERE judge_experience > 5;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY project_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_title, project_description FROM projects WHERE student_name = 'Alice' AND project_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT judge_name, judge_experience, judge_department FROM judges ORDER BY judge_experience DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT project_title, project_description, project_date FROM projects WHERE project_title LIKE '%machine learning%' AND project_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM projects p INNER JOIN judges j ON p.student_name = j.judge_name WHERE p.project_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, title, abstract FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT advisor_id, department FROM advisors WHERE advisor_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT title, advisor_id FROM projects WHERE advisor_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT title, advisor_id FROM projects WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM advisors WHERE advisor_id = 2;
SELECT project_id, title, student_id, advisor_id FROM projects WHERE advisor_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, title, abstract FROM projects WHERE project_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_title, student_name FROM project WHERE project_grade > 85;
SELECT project_id, project_title, project_grade FROM project ORDER BY project_grade DESC;
SELECT judge_name, judge_email FROM judge WHERE judge_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT project_title, score_value FROM project INNER JOIN score ON project.project_id = score.project_id;
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_title, project_grade FROM project WHERE project_grade > 90;
SELECT judge_id, judge_name FROM judge ORDER BY judge_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(score_id) AS num_scores FROM score GROUP BY project_id HAVING num_scores > 3;
SELECT project_id, judge_id, comment_text FROM comment WHERE judge_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT title, presentation_date FROM projects ORDER BY presentation_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT full_name, email FROM advisors WHERE advisor_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT project_id, COUNT(comment_id) AS num_comments FROM comments GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT full_name, email FROM advisors WHERE advisor_id = 3;
SELECT project_id, title, presentation_date FROM projects ORDER BY presentation_date DESC;
SELECT p.project_id, p.title, s.full_name AS student_name, a.full_name AS advisor_name FROM projects p JOIN students s ON p.student_id = s.student_id JOIN advisors a ON p.advisor_id = a.advisor_id;

SELECT c.comment_id, c.comment_text, c.comment_date, p.title AS project_title, s.full_name AS commenter_name FROM comments c JOIN projects p ON c.project_id = p.project_id JOIN students s ON c.commenter_id = s.student_id WHERE YEAR(c.comment_date) = 2022 ORDER BY c.comment_date DESC;
